    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A Kádár-rendszer gazdasága</string>
            <string language="en">The economy of Kádár system</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Wirtschaft des Kádár Systems</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'économie du système de Kádár</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A economia do sistema de Kádár</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'economia del sistema di Kádár</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η οικονομία του συστήματος Kαdαr</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La economía del sistema de Kádár</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A korszakolás, a reform és az azt követő időszak bemutatása.</string>
            <string language="en">Introducing of the periodization, the reform and the following time</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">gazdasági rendszer,  új gazdasági mechanizmus,  Nyers Rezső,  </string>
            <string language="en">economic system, new economic mechanism, Nyers Rezso</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einführen des periodization, der Verbesserung und
der folgenden Zeit</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Présentation du periodization, de la réforme et 
du temps suivant</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Introduzir do periodization, da reforma e do 
seguinte tempo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Introduzione del periodization, della riforma e di
seguente tempo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εισαγωγή του periodization, της μεταρρύθμισης και του
ακόλουθου χρόνου</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El introducir del periodization, de la reforma y 
del tiempo siguiente</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wirtschaftssystem, neue ökonomische Einheit, Nyers 
Rezso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">système économique, nouveau mécanisme économique, 
Nyers Rezso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sistema econômico, mecanismo econômico novo, Nyers 
Rezso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sistema economico, nuovo meccanismo economico, Nyers 
Rezso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οικονομικό σύστημα, νέος οικονομικός μηχανισμός, Nyers 
Rezso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sistema económico, nuevo mecanismo económico, Nyers 
Rezso</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
